titleStmt.title: SII 14.177: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 177. (A.R. No. 114 of 1905.) MAṈṈĀRKŌYIL, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE GŌPĀLASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record, which was incised in the reign of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Sundara-Chōḷapāṇḍya, whose regnal year is, however, lost in a portion which is now missing, gives a catalogue of several persons who had received gifts of buffaloes and cows from the Chēra king Rāśiṅgadēvar-Bhaṇḍāram (i. e., Rājasiṁha), in return for which they had to supply specified quantities of ghee to the temple for burning therewith perpetual lamps.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
� ... svastiśrī . koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa śrīcuntaracoḷapāṇḍyadevaṟkuThe left ends of lines are built in by the steps.
Āka ney Uḻakkum Irāma ṉaraṅkaṉ ceramāṉār Irāciṅkatevar paṇṭāra The continuity of line 2 is doubtful but it is engraved under line 1.
ṉār Irāciṅkatevar paṇṭārattu pacu Irupattaiñcu koṇṭu kaṭava ney Uḻakkum Iv
peṟṟāṉ paṭāraṉ ceramāṉār Irāciṅkatevar paṇṭārattu Erumai muṉṟu koṇṭu kaṭava ne
Āḻākkum Ivvūr paṭākai vaḻutiyūr Irukkum veḷḷāḷaṉ mālacūṟṟivaicca Erumai mu
ṭu kaṭava ney Āḻākney Iru ceviṭarai caṭaiyaṉ cūṟṟi ceramāṉār Irā
ṭārattu Erumai Iraṇṭu pacu nāluṅ koṇṭu kaṭava ney
Aṭṭakkaṭava ney Āḻākku Ivaṉukkup puṇai malai kuruntaṉ ma
muṉṟu koṇṭu kaṭava ney Āḻākkum Āccalam pāṇṭaṉ I
Digital edition of SII 14.177 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
